lead_paragraph: Sacramento guard Kevin Martin agreed in principle to a contract extension with the Kings. Geoff Petrie, the Kings’ president of basketball operations, announced the deal, which is believed to be a five-year extension to begin in the 2008-9 season. Martin’s agent, Jason Levien, could not be reached for comment.Martin, who will begin his fourth N.B.A. season in the fall, was the Kings’ leading scorer last season with 20.2 points per game.
